Challenge System Commands.description: Commands for participating in and managing coding challenges

commands.name: leaderboard
commands.description: This gives users the ability to see the top 10 users on the leaderboard and also their position on the leaderboard.

commands.name: submit
commands.description: This is how users can submit answers to the challenge questions.

commands.name: add-points
commands.description: This allows mods to automatically add points to a participant's challenge.

commands.name: challenge
commands.description: This command allows mods to add additional challenge questions.
commands.example: ++challenge 1 What is your favorite programming language?

commands.name: start-challenge
commands.description: This gives mods the ability to start a challenge.

commands.name: createcommands
commands.description: Allows Erin to create the Slash Commands.

commands.name: help
commands.description: This allows users to find out more information on all of our commands.

commands.name: format
commands.description: Asks people to format their code with backticks or code blocks.

commands.name: bot-status
commands.description: Pushes an embed to display in the channel about a bot update
commands.example: /bot-status Fixed a bug in the help command

commands.name: server-status
commands.description: Pushes an embed to display in the channel about a server update

commands.name: dm
commands.description: Sends a direct message to a user
